name: Andrew W. Eckford
content: EckfordLab Main Page From EckfordLab Jump to:					navigation, 					search EckfordLab Molecular Communication and Information Theory Laboratory EckfordLab, the Molecular Communication and Information Theory Laboratory under the supervision of Professor Andrew Eckford, is located in the Lassonde School of Engineering at York University, Toronto, Canada. The lab is concerned with problems involving molecular communication, computational biology, and information theory.
